verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:1
verses.text: Filii Levi : Gerson, Caath, et Merari.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:2
verses.text: Filii Caath : Amram, Isaar, Hebron, et Oziel.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:3
verses.text: Filii Amram : Aaron, Moyses, et Maria. Filii Aaron : Nadab et Abiu, Eleazar, et Ithamar.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:4
verses.text: Eleazar genuit Phinees, et Phinees genuit Abisue.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:5
verses.text: Abisue vero genuit Bocci, et Bocci genuit Ozi.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:6
verses.text: Ozi genuit Zaraiam, et Zaraias genuit Meraioth.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:7
verses.text: Porro Meraioth genuit Amariam, et Amarias genuit Achitob.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:8
verses.text: Achitob genuit Sadoc, et Sadoc genuit Achimaas,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:9
verses.text: Achimaas genuit Azariam, Azarias genuit Johanan,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:10
verses.text: Johanan genuit Azariam : ipse est qui sacerdotio functus est in domo quam ædificavit Salomon in Jerusalem.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:11
verses.text: Genuit autem Azarias Amariam, et Amarias genuit Achitob,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:12
verses.text: Achitob genuit Sadoc, et Sadoc genuit Sellum,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:13
verses.text: Sellum genuit Helciam, et Helcias genuit Azariam,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:14
verses.text: Azarias genuit Saraiam, et Saraias genuit Josedec.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:15
verses.text: Porro Josedec egressus est, quando transtulit Dominus Judam et Jerusalem per manus Nabuchodonosor.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:16
verses.text: Filii ergo Levi : Gersom, Caath, et Merari.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:17
verses.text: Et hæc nomina filiorum Gersom : Lobni, et Semei.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:18
verses.text: Filii Caath : Amram, et Isaar, et Hebron, et Oziel.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:19
verses.text: Filii Merari : Moholi et Musi. Hæ autem cognationes Levi secundum familias eorum.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:20
verses.text: Gersom : Lobni filius ejus, Jahath filius ejus, Zamma filius ejus,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:21
verses.text: Joah filius ejus, Addo filius ejus, Zara filius ejus, Jethrai filius ejus.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:22
verses.text: Filii Caath : Aminadab filius ejus, Core filius ejus, Asir filius ejus,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:23
verses.text: Elcana filius ejus, Abiasaph filius ejus, Asir filius ejus,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:24
verses.text: Thahath filius ejus, Uriel filius ejus, Ozias filius ejus, Saul filius ejus.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:25
verses.text: Filii Elcana, Amasai et Achimoth

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:26
verses.text: et Elcana. Filii Elcana : Sophai filius ejus, Nahath filius ejus,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:27
verses.text: Eliab filius ejus, Jeroham filius ejus, Elcana filius ejus.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:28
verses.text: Filii Samuel : primogenitus Vasseni, et Abia.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:29
verses.text: Filii autem Merari, Moholi : Lobni filius ejus, Semei filius ejus, Oza filius ejus,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:30
verses.text: Sammaa filius ejus, Haggia filius ejus, Asaia filius ejus.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:31
verses.text: Isti sunt quos constituit David super cantores domus Domini, ex quo collocata est arca :

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:32
verses.text: et ministrabant coram tabernaculo testimonii, canentes donec ædificaret Salomon domum Domini in Jerusalem : stabant autem juxta ordinem suum in ministerio.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:33
verses.text: Hi vero sunt qui assistebant cum filiis suis, de filiis Caath, Hemam cantor filius Johel, filii Samuel,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:34
verses.text: filii Elcana, filii Jeroham, filii Eliel, filii Thohu,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:35
verses.text: filii Suph, filii Elcana, filii Mahath, filii Amasai,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:36
verses.text: filii Elcana, filii Johel, filii Azariæ, filii Sophoniæ,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:37
verses.text: filii Thahath, filii Asir, filii Abiasaph, filii Core,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:38
verses.text: filii Isaar, filii Caath, filii Levi, filii Israël.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:39
verses.text: Et frater ejus Asaph, qui stabat a dextris ejus, Asaph filius Barachiæ, filii Samaa,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:40
verses.text: filii Michaël, filii Basaiæ, filii Melchiæ,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:41
verses.text: filii Athanai, filii Zara, filii Adaia,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:42
verses.text: filii Ethan, filii Zamma, filii Semei,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:43
verses.text: filii Jeth, filii Gersom, filii Levi.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:44
verses.text: Filii autem Merari fratres eorum, ad sinistram, Ethan filius Cusi, filii Abdi, filii Maloch,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:45
verses.text: filii Hasabiæ, filii Amasiæ, filii Helciæ,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:46
verses.text: filii Amasai, filii Boni, filii Somer,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:47
verses.text: filii Moholi, filii Musi, filii Merari, filii Levi.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:48
verses.text: Fratres quoque eorum Levitæ, qui ordinati sunt in cunctum ministerium tabernaculi domus Domini.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:49
verses.text: Aaron vero et filii ejus adolebant incensum super altare holocausti, et super altare thymiamatis, in omne opus Sancti sanctorum : et ut precarentur pro Israël juxta omnia quæ præceperat Moyses servus Dei.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:50
verses.text: Hi sunt autem filii Aaron : Eleazar filius ejus, Phinees filius ejus, Abisue filius ejus,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:51
verses.text: Bocci filius ejus, Ozi filius ejus, Zarahia filius ejus,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:52
verses.text: Meraioth filius ejus, Amarias filius ejus, Achitob filius ejus,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:53
verses.text: Sadoc filius ejus, Achimaas filius ejus.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:54
verses.text: Et hæc habitacula eorum per vicos atque confinia, filiorum scilicet Aaron, juxta cognationes Caathitarum : ipsis enim sorte contigerant.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:55
verses.text: Dederunt igitur eis Hebron in terra Juda, et suburbana ejus per circuitum :

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:56
verses.text: agros autem civitatis, et villas, Caleb filio Jephone.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:57
verses.text: Porro filiis Aaron dederunt civitates ad confugiendum Hebron, et Lobna, et suburbana ejus,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:58
verses.text: Jether quoque, et Esthemo cum suburbanis suis, sed et Helon, et Dabir cum suburbanis suis,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:59
verses.text: Asan quoque, et Bethsemes, et suburbana earum.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:60
verses.text: De tribu autem Benjamin, Gabee et suburbana ejus, et Almath cum suburbanis suis, Anathoth quoque cum suburbanis suis : omnes civitates, tredecim, per cognationes suas.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:61
verses.text: Filiis autem Caath residuis de cognatione sua dederunt ex dimidia tribu Manasse in possessionem urbes decem.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:62
verses.text: Porro filiis Gersom per cognationes suas de tribu Issachar, et de tribu Aser, et de tribu Nephthali, et de tribu Manasse in Basan, urbes tredecim.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:63
verses.text: Filiis autem Merari per cognationes suas de tribu Ruben, et de tribu Gad, et de tribu Zabulon, dederunt sorte civitates duodecim.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:64
verses.text: Dederunt quoque filii Israël Levitis civitates, et suburbana earum :

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:65
verses.text: dederuntque per sortem, ex tribu filiorum Juda, et ex tribu filiorum Simeon, et ex tribu filiorum Benjamin urbes has, quas vocaverunt nominibus suis,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:66
verses.text: et his, qui erant de cognatione filiorum Caath, fueruntque civitates in terminis eorum de tribu Ephraim.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:67
verses.text: Dederunt ergo eis urbes ad confugiendum, Sichem cum suburbanis suis in monte Ephraim, et Gazer cum suburbanis suis,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:68
verses.text: Jecmaam quoque cum suburbanis suis, et Bethoron similiter,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:69
verses.text: necnon et Helon cum suburbanis suis, et Gethremmon in eumdem modum.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:70
verses.text: Porro ex dimidia tribu Manasse, Aner et suburbana ejus, Balaam et suburbana ejus : his videlicet, qui de cognatione filiorum Caath reliqui erant.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:71
verses.text: Filiis autem Gersom de cognatione dimidiæ tribus Manasse, Gaulon in Basan, et suburbana ejus, et Astaroth cum suburbanis suis.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:72
verses.text: De tribu Issachar, Cedes et suburbanis suis, et Dabereth cum suburbanis suis,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:73
verses.text: Ramoth quoque et suburbana ejus, et Anem cum suburbanis suis.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:74
verses.text: De tribu vero Aser : Masal cum suburbanis suis, et Abdon similiter,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:75
verses.text: Hucac quoque et suburbana ejus, et Rohob cum suburbanis suis.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:76
verses.text: Porro de tribu Nephthali, Cedes in Galilæa et suburbana ejus, Hamon cum suburbanis suis, et Cariathaim et suburbana ejus.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:77
verses.text: Filiis autem Merari residuis : de tribu Zabulon, Remmono et suburbana ejus, et Thabor cum suburbanis sus :

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:78
verses.text: trans Jordanem quoque ex adverso Jericho contra orientem Jordanis, de tribu Ruben, Bosor in solitudine cum suburbanis suis, et Jassa cum suburbanis suis,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:79
verses.text: Cademoth quoque et suburbana ejus, et Mephaat cum suburbanis suis.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:80
verses.text: Necnon et de tribu Gad, Ramoth in Galaad et suburbana ejus, et Manaim cum suburbanis suis,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:81
verses.text: sed et Hesebon cum suburbanis suis, et Jezer cum suburbanis suis.
